block.p: CATERPILLAR INC., -- Peoria, Ill., bought out the remaining 50 percent of its joint venture with Dale Elphinstone Property Ltd. of Australia, a producer of mining equipment. Terms of the deal were not disclosed.
TICKETS.COM INC., -- Costa Mesa, Calif., an online ticket provider, said it would cut 220 jobs and reorganize its operations into two business units.
